meanings: profit and loss, gain and loss
income statement, profit and loss account

vlive.korean: 마진 손익분기가 안 나와서... I didn't make profit... 듣기 View video 10PM : 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 A night's entertainment news
350만 명이 손익 분기점이에요. 3.5 million is the break-even point. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : <덕혜옹주> 스팟라이브 ' Spot Live'

examples.korean: The company just about broke even last year. 발음듣기 회사가 작년에는 손익이 거의 비슷했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The company just about broke even last year. 발음

examples.korean: At this point we’re just breaking even. 발음듣기 우리는 바로 손익 분기점에 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At this point we’re just breaking even. 발음

examples.korean: What do we need to charge to break even? 발음듣기 손익분기점을 맞추려면 얼마를 받아야 하죠? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What do we need to charge to break even? 발음

examples.korean: As per our conversation, I'm sending you profit/loss statements (by business unit) for the past two years. 발음듣기 얘기했던 것처럼, 지난 2년간 (사업부서별) 손익 계산서를 보내드립니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As per our conversation, I'm sending you profit/loss statements (by business unit) for the past two years. 발음

examples.korean: Currently, oil producers are just barely breaking even. 발음듣기 현재 석유 제조업자들은 간신히 수지를(손익분기점을) 맞추고 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: Currently, oil producers are just barely breaking even. 발음
